courseSectionInformation: Same as ATMS 535. Prerequisite: CEE 446 and MATH 285.
description: Principles of sampling for particles and gases in the field of air pollution; instrumental techniques relevant to the design of sampling systems used in process control, ambient air monitoring, and laboratory experiments; methods of sample analysis and their limitations. Same as ATMS 535. Prerequisite: CEE 446 and MATH 285.
label: Aerosol Sampling and Analysis
